column2: three stars.  If you want appetizers before your pizza
column3: this is a fine place.  Or
column4: if you want to finish those last 80 pages of James Joyce's Ulysses in a setting in which you won't be disturbed for a while
column6: go to Portillos and enjoy the char-grilled sausage with grilled onions...   It won't satisfy your pizza craving
column7: but you'll be on your way to your next stop a lot more quickly.
